name: MetaVerse Dog
description: MetaVerse Dog is the Meme Token for the Metaverse generation. Combining a dog theme with the Metaverse, MetaVerse Dog aims to go to places other coins have never been before. We are looking to build a community of dog lovers with people who believe the Metaverse can be a better place for all to build from. We aim to build an ecosystem with community feedback and exciting features. Staking, NFT's, trading cards, and virtual land are some of the things our team is working on. Developing a gaming platform is also central to our goals. Our strong community is being built on various social media platforms. We will airdrop free tokens to our early community members who sign up via social media. We plan to organize events within our community. Our goal is to get everyone involved in our project.
